name: Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish and serve with straw.
text:
Mojito

Category: Cocktail

Glass: Highball glass

Tags: IBA, ContemporaryClassic, Alcoholic, USA, Asia, Vegan, Citrus, Brunch, Hangover, Mild

Instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish and serve with straw.

Ingredients: Soda water, Light Rum 2-3 oz, Lime Juice of 1, Mint 2-4, Sugar 2 tsp

name: Old Fashioned
instructions:
Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.

Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.
text:
Old Fashioned

Category: Cocktail

Glass: Old-fashioned glass

Tags: IBA, Classic, Alcoholic, Expensive, Savory

Instructions: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.

Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.

Ingredients: Water dash, Sugar 1 cube, Angostura Bitters 2 dashes, Bourbon 4.5 cL

name: Long Island Tea
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.
text:
Long Island Tea

Category: Ordinary Drink

Glass: Highball glass

Tags: Strong, Asia, StrongFlavor, Brunch, Vegetarian, Sour, Alcoholic

Instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.

Ingredients: Light Rum 1/2 oz, lemon Juice of 1/2, Vodka 1/2 oz, Gin 1/2 oz, Tequila 1/2 oz, Coca-Cola 1 splash

name: Negroni
instructions: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.
text:
Negroni

Category: Ordinary Drink

Glass: Old-fashioned glass

Tags: IBA, Classic, Alcoholic

Instructions: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

Ingredients: Sweet Vermouth 1 oz, Gin 1 oz, Campari 1 oz

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve. If served 'On the rocks', strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.
text:
Whiskey Sour

Category: Ordinary Drink

Glass: Old-fashioned glass

Tags: IBA, Classic, Alcoholic, ContemporaryClassic

Instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve. If served 'On the rocks', strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

Ingredients: Powdered Sugar 1/2 tsp, lemon 1/2 slice, Blended Whiskey 2 oz, Cherry 1

name: Dry Martini
instructions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.
text:
Dry Martini

Category: Cocktail

Glass: Cocktail glass

Tags: IBA, Classic, Christmas, Alcoholic

Instructions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

Ingredients: Dry Vermouth 1/3 oz, Gin 1 2/3 oz, Olive 1

name: Daiquiri
instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.
text:
Daiquiri

Category: Ordinary Drink

Glass: Cocktail glass

Tags: IBA, Classic, Beach, Alcoholic

Instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

Ingredients: Light Rum 1 1/2 oz, Lime Juice of 1/2, Powdered Sugar 1 tsp

name: Margarita
instructions: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.
text:
Margarita

Category: Ordinary Drink

Glass: Cocktail glass

Tags: IBA, ContemporaryClassic, Alcoholic

Instructions: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.

Ingredients: Tequila 1 1/2 oz, Lime Juice 1 oz, Salt, Triple Sec 1/2 oz

name: Manhattan
instructions: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.
text:
Manhattan

Category: Cocktail

Glass: Cocktail glass

Tags: IBA, Classic, Alcoholic

Instructions: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

Ingredients: Angostura Bitters dash, Bourbon 2 1/2 oz Blended, Ice 2 or 3, Maraschino Cherry 1, Orange Peel 1 twist of, Sweet Vermouth 3/4 oz

name: Moscow Mule
instructions: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.

Moscow Mule

Category: Punch / Party Drink

Glass: Copper Mug

Tags: IBA, ContemporaryClassic, Alcoholic

Instructions: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.

Ingredients: Vodka 2 oz, Ginger Ale 8 oz, Lime Juice 2 oz

name: English Highball
